hero_title: The Offline Financial Validation Toolkit for .NET
hero_subtitle_1: Validate IBANs, Payment References, and Business Numbers locally.
hero_disclaimer: Note: Finova performs format and algorithm validation offline. It does not verify account existence with banks or validate against external registries (e.g., VIES). For production use, combine with appropriate account verification services.
feature_zero_dep_desc: No external packages required. Keep your project lightweight and avoid dependency hell.
feature_fast_desc: 0-1ms validation time per operation. Optimized algorithms for high-throughput systems.
feature_privacy_desc: 100% Offline. No API calls. Your sensitive financial data never leaves your server.
feature_benelux_desc: Specialized support for BE (OGM/VCS), NL, and LU specific standards and formats.
feature_iso_desc: Built strictly according to ISO 13616 (IBAN), ISO 11649 (RF Creditor Reference), and ISO 7064 (Mod 97) standards.
demo_enums_desc: No magic strings. Use strongly typed enums for formats and countries.
demo_di_desc: Interfaces included for easy mocking and testing in your applications.
demo_tests_desc: Extensive test suite covering edge cases and official validation algorithms.
validations_subtitle: Comprehensive offline validation for financial identifiers across the Benelux region.
val_iban_desc: Validate International Bank Account Numbers with full Mod97 algorithm support.
val_payment_desc: Generate and validate structured payment communication references.
val_business_desc: Validate enterprise and VAT identification numbers for Benelux companies.
roadmap_now_desc: Initial release with support for IBAN, OGM/VCS, and Mod97 validation.
roadmap_q1_2026_desc: Implementation of Luhn Algorithm for credit card number validation.
roadmap_q3_2026_desc: Support for National Numbers and other local identifiers.
roadmap_q1_2027_desc: Generation and validation of pain.001 and pain.008 messages.
